article_title: R.I. panel examining a statewide teachers contract
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: PROVIDENCE, R.I. — For the first time in more than a decade, the General Assembly is looking at the pros and cons of creating a statewide teachers contract.  But a lot has changed since the Department of Administration studied this issue in 2004. The cost of health insurance has soared and health coverage has expanded to tens of millions of Americans thanks to the Affordable Care Act.These changes in the health care landscape have prompted the state's two teachers' unions to take a
article_metadata.author: Linda Borg
